Content: Major General Darshana Hettiarachchi, Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna (SF-J) made a formal visit to the 5 Sri Lanka Army Service Corps (SLASC) camp in Jaffna on Monday (3) and opened its new office complex building. He was received by the Commanding Officer of the Battalion, Lieutenant Colonel Chaminda Madurawala on arrival. During the visit, Commander, SF-J declared open the main office building which was constructed by all the troops of all battalions under command to the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna. A large gathering of Senior Officers, Officers and Other Ranks attended the event.
